item.description:
Celtic music at the Vanilla Bean in Pomfret! A lot of people were unable to make the last music meetup here, due to the ice on the road, so let's try again.

http://www.vanillabeancafe.com/entertainment.html

There's a non-mandatory 10$ cover for the show.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at a table in the main room where the stage is
item.why: We'll still be in St. Patrick's Day mode, perhaps -- and music is always a good thing :)

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Hear Cashel Rock (Celtic music) at the Vanilla Bean
